pkgmetadata.longdescription: Identification of Counterfactual Queries in Causal Models // Facilitates the identification of counterfactual queries in structural causal models via the ID* and IDC* algorithms by Shpitser, I. and Pearl, J. (2007, 2008) arXiv:1206.5294, https://jmlr.org/papers/v9/shpitser08a.html. Provides a simple interface for defining causal diagrams and counterfactual conjunctions. Construction of parallel worlds graphs and counterfactual graphs is carried out automatically based on the counterfactual query and the causal diagram. See Tikka, S. (2023) doi:10.32614/RJ-2023-053 for a tutorial of the package.
